Authors:
Ralf Stracke, Daniela Holtgräwe, Jessica Schneider, Boas
Pucker, Thomas Rosleff Sörensen, Bernd Weisshaar
Title:
Genome-wide identification and characterisation of R2R3-MYB
genes in sugar beet (Beta vulgaris)
Keywords:
Beta vulgaris, Caryophyllales, R2R3 MYB, transcription
factor, gene family, flavonol regulator
Abstract:
Background The R2R3 MYB genes comprise one of the largest
transcription factor gene families in plants, playing regulatory roles
in plant-specific developmental processes, metabolite accumulation and
defense responses. Although genome-wide analysis of this gene family has
been carried out in some species, the R2R3 MYB genes in Beta vulgaris
ssp. vulgaris (sugar beet) as the first sequenced member of the order
Caryophyllales, have not been analysed heretofore.
